hooks.command: file_path=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // empty'); if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.(sql|md)$'; then if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '(problems|optimization|interview)/'; then echo 'REVIEW REQUIRED: Content file modified - verify schema CHECK constraints (user_segment: premium/regular/inactive, orders.status: completed/cancelled/pending, subscriptions.status: active/cancelled/expired)'; fi; fi; exit 0

cmd=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.command // empty'); if echo "$cmd" | grep -qiE 'DROP\s+(TABLE|DATABASE|INDEX)|TRUNCATE|DELETE\s+FROM.*WHERE\s*$'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Destructive SQL command detected. Use explicit confirmation.'; exit 2; fi; exit 0
